Audio Description: Looking out at the viewer is an older woman with gray and black hair, wearing a dark red dress, a string of pearls, and pearl clip earrings. On the light green background behind her is a service flag with a blue star in the center of a white rectangle, framed in red. Above, in white letters, are the words “Won’t you give my boy a chance to get home?” Below her, in black and red letters on a rectangle of white, are the words “Don’t travel, unless your trip helps win the war.”
Creator: United States. Office of Defense Transportation
Description: Poster, 50 x 68 cm, artist: Jerome George Rozen
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.

Title: Won't you give my boy a chance to get home?: don't travel unless your trip helps win the war
